name: reverse_index_at_region_top_scrolls
description: RI at scroll-region top scrolls region down
comment: Fill rows 0..4 with A..E at col 0. Set DECSTBM(2,4) -> region rows 1..3. CUP(2,1) to region top. RI (ESC M) at region top scrolls region down: row1 blank, row2<-B, row3<-C; rows 0 and 4 remain A and E.
